item.title: Hugo Benchmark
item.description: A benchmark of Hugo generating a site with 5,000 posts on an SSD and spindle drive.

item.title: Continuous Integration and Delivery with CircleCI
item.description: Learn how CircleCI helps teams work better together through continuous integration and delivery. Run every commit through your automated pipeline and find problems quickly, without delay or time off.
